pageContext.claim: “He [Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison] told the throngs of violent demonstrators, 'By all means, exercise your First Amendment rights,' aye, he said that, prior to them ripping down your city.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appeared to be referring to an interview Ellison had, not any speech before "violent demonstrators." But I=in the interview, Ellison said protests should be peaceful: "I just say to those folks, you know, we've never seen meaningful social change without people getting in the street, raising their voices. I say be safe. Remember COVID. I say, you know, be peaceful. But by all means, exercise your First Amendment right, because if we don't have that, it’s extremely difficult to get policymakers to implement the changes that could bring about a better set of circumstances for us.."
